item.title: CVE-2014-5209|2024-08-06T11:41:47.478Z -- ntp -- ntp
item.description: An Information Disclosure vulnerability exists in NTP 4.2.7p25 private (mode 6/7) messages via a GET_RESTRICT control message, which could let a malicious user obtain sensitive information.
